definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: 2nd station of Isr. fr. Hor Nu 33:42, Nu 33:43, F(e)inw; betw. Petra and Zoar, famous for mines, Gk. Finwn, Fainwn Euseb:Onom. ed. Lag. 299, 85, v. also Ritter:Erdkunde, Asien. xiv, 125 ff. Seetzen:Reise iii, 17 (Kálaêt Phenân); perh. = Edom. n.pr.m. [[פִּינׁן]] q.v.
